channel.title: Asia on BenOnTrack
channel.description: Recent content in Asia on BenOnTrack

item.title: Vietnam - The Authentic South East Asia
item.description: Vietnam Vietnam has definitely been my best experience in South East Asia thanks to its authenticity ! Enjoy this little video and don’t hesitate to post a comment.

item.title: Vietnam's best kept secret !
item.description: Ha-Giang Loop Vietnam will be my very first experience in South East Asia. And it’s probably still the best so far!

item.title: A glimpse to Malaysian food - the Ultimate experience!
item.description: When it comes to food, Malaysia is definitely THE gastronomic delight for any foodie !! Some people eat to live, while others live to eat.

item.title: Borneo - The Orang-outan sanctuary
item.description: After a few weeks in Malaysia and Australia, we took off to Borneo and its impressive wildlife, beaches and jungle !

item.title: Penang - The Pearl of the Orient
item.description: Penang The “Pearl of the Orient” is regarded as the food capital of Malaysia, but since 2012 George Town became famous for its Street Art.

item.title: Singalila Ridge Trek
item.description: The Story I’ve spent the last 2 days in Darjeeling, hoping from travel agency to travel agency seeking for any other hikers interested to trek within Singalila National Park but in vain.

item.title: Nepal - The Annapurna circuit
item.description: The Circuit After a few more days spent in Varanasi, I’ve decided to reach Nepal to start my hiking journey since the high season is already on.

item.title: Sri Lanka - The hidden gem
item.description: Starting from Colombo city, we decide to travel around the Cultural triangle of Sri Lanka… After a quick discussion with Benoît who’s joining me on this trip, we decide to skip the beaches and instead focus on the strong sri lankan culture, mainly made of a mix of Sinhalese, Tamil and Muslim.

item.title: India - Kerala
item.description: Heading south to Kerala and its famous backwaters Kerala After another terrible night bus trip from Bangalore, and a small ferry trip, I’ve reached Kochi, my first city in Kerala on the Malabar coast of India.

item.title: India - Goa
item.description: I’ve landed in Goa, famous for its beaches and festive atmosphere. Knowing it’s the low season, I don’t expect to party but more to chill and relax…

item.title: India - Maharashtra
item.description: I’ve landed in Mumbai (also known as Bombay), capital city of Maharashtra. It’s funny to know that Mumbai city population exceeds the entire belgian population.
